title: The Sleeze Brothers 03
description:
The third in the Sleeze Brothers series presented in .Jpg format 

The Sleeze Brothers was a short-lived comic published by Epic Comics, between August 1989 and January 1990 (UK release dates), lasting for 6 issues. A collection of the six issues were later released in 1990, along with a final extended issue in 1991.The comic depicts a futuristic Earth rife with extraterrestrials, pollution, crime and corruption. As adults they use amoral and often underhanded methods to get the results demanded by their insalubrious and eclectic clients.

The title characters in the Sleeze Brothers comics were loosely inspired by Jake and Elwood Blues from the cult movie The Blues Brothers, but were actually based on Andy LanningÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢s two cousins, Phil and Pete Carmichael. These two characters appeared on the front cover of the collected edition.
